title: Create a new account
instructions: Enter your **First name** and **Last Name** and chose a **email address** and **Password**. Choose the country phone code corresponding to your country, and enter your phone number. This is asked for security purposes. Next, enter your birth **month**, **Day** and **Year**. Finally, you can give your gender by selecting male or female but this is optional. Once done, click **Continue**.
help: Enter your real telephone number as Yahoo will send you a confirmation code to be sure that you, and nobody else, created this account.
